Package controller

Class EnquiryController

java.lang.Object
controller.EnquiryController
public class EnquiryController extends Object
Controller class that manages enquiries in the BTO application system. This class provides functionality for users to view, submit, edit, reply to, and delete enquiries related to BTO projects.

  • Constructor Details

    • EnquiryController

      public EnquiryController()

  • Method Details

    • handleEnquiries

      public void handleEnquiries(User user, boolean viewAsApplicant)
      Displays the enquiry menu and handles user choices for enquiry operations. Allows users to view, submit, edit, and delete enquiries based on their role.
      Parameters:
      user - The user interacting with the enquiry system
      viewAsApplicant - Flag indicating whether to view enquiries as an applicant (true) or officer (false)

    • viewEnquiry

      public void viewEnquiry(User user)
      Displays all enquiries relevant to the user based on their role. For officers, shows all enquiries they can respond to. For applicants, shows all their submitted enquiries.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose enquiries to display

    • viewEnquiry

      public void viewEnquiry(User user, String viewAsApplicant)
      Displays enquiries specifically for an applicant. This overloaded method is used when officers want to view enquiries as if they were a specific applicant.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose enquiries to view
      viewAsApplicant - A string flag indicating to view enquiries as an applicant

    • printEnquiries

      public void printEnquiries(List<Enquiry> enquiries)
      Displays a formatted table of enquiries with wrapped text for better readability. Shows enquiry ID, applicant ID, project ID, enquiry text, reply text, and status.
      Parameters:
      enquiries - The list of enquiries to display

    • replyToEnquiry

      public void replyToEnquiry(User user)
      Allows officers to reply to pending enquiries. Checks if the enquiry exists and hasn't been replied to before allowing a reply.
      Parameters:
      user - The officer user who is replying to the enquiry

    • submitEnquiry

      public void submitEnquiry(User user)
      Allows a user to submit a new enquiry about a specific project. Validates input to ensure the enquiry text is not empty.
      Parameters:
      user - The user submitting the enquiry

    • editEnquiry

      public void editEnquiry(User user)
      Allows a user to edit their own pending enquiries. Validates that the enquiry belongs to the user and is still in PENDING status.
      Parameters:
      user - The user editing the enquiry

    • deleteEnquiry

      public void deleteEnquiry(User user)
      Allows a user to delete their own enquiries. Verifies that the enquiry belongs to the user before deletion.
      Parameters:
      user - The user deleting the enquiry
